author: Reuters
title: U.S. economy could reopen in May, Steven Mnuchin says
description: But many medical experts say closures and social distancing measures will need to stay in place for longer to defeat the coronavirus
content: WASHINGTON — U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said on Thursday that the American economy could start to reopen for business in May, despite many medical experts saying that closures and social distancing measures will need to stay in place for longer to… [+2315 chars]
